mapper.select: select a.name, p.place_name, a.id, a.start_date, a.end_date, a.open_date, a.running_time, a.running_intertime, a.SUB_CATEGORY_SEQ, a.status, a.age_limit, f.files_sysname, a.max_ticket, a.place_seq from apply a left outer join place p on a.place_seq = p.place_seq left outer join files f on a.application_seq = f.files_parent_seq where a.application_seq=#{seq}
select * from seats where place_seq=#{place_seq} order by PRICE_SEAT desc
SELECT casting_name, casting_role, MIN(file_sysname) AS file_sysname FROM casting WHERE application_seq = #{seq} GROUP BY casting_name, casting_role ORDER BY casting_role
SELECT DISTINCT TO_CHAR(schedule_day, 'DAY') AS days FROM schedule where application_seq=#{seq}
SELECT DISTINCT TO_CHAR(schedule_time, 'HH24:MI') AS times FROM schedule where application_seq=#{seq}

select datas.schedule_day, datas.schedule_time, datas.days, datas.day_number, datas.times, c.casting_name, c.casting_role, c.file_sysname from (SELECT s.*, TO_CHAR(s.schedule_day, 'DAY') AS days, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(s.schedule_day, 'D') = '1' THEN 0 ELSE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.schedule_day, 'D')) - 1 END AS day_number, TO_CHAR(s.schedule_time, 'HH24:MI') AS times FROM schedule s WHERE s.application_seq = #{seq} ORDER BY schedule_day) datas left join casting c on datas.day_number = c.SCHEDULE_DAY and datas.schedule_time= c.schedule_time WHERE c.application_seq = #{seq} ORDER BY datas.schedule_day, datas.schedule_time, c.casting_role

select datas.schedule_day, datas.schedule_time, datas.days, datas.day_number, datas.times from (SELECT s.*, TO_CHAR(s.schedule_day, 'DAY') AS days, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(s.schedule_day, 'D') = '1' THEN 0 ELSE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.schedule_day, 'D')) - 1 END AS day_number, TO_CHAR(s.schedule_time, 'HH24:MI') AS times FROM schedule s WHERE s.application_seq = #{seq} ORDER BY schedule_day) datas ORDER BY datas.schedule_day, datas.schedule_time

select r.review_seq, r.member_id, r.review_title, r.review, r.review_date, s.stars from review r left outer join stars s on r.review_seq = s.review_seq where r.application_seq=#{seq} order by r.REVIEW_DATE desc

select * from( select r.review_seq, r.member_id, r.review_title, r.review, r.review_date, s.stars, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (
ORDER BY ${keyword} DESC
ORDER BY r.review_date DESC
) as rown from review r left outer join stars s on r.review_seq = s.review_seq where r.application_seq=#{seq} order by r.REVIEW_DATE desc ) where rown between #{start} and #{end} order by rown
